setup:
#!/bin/bash
set -o errexit
set -o verbose

i=0
DRIVE_POLL_DELAY=2
DRIVE_RETRY_MAX=120

while [ ! -d "/cygdrive/z" ]; do
    sleep "$DRIVE_POLL_DELAY"
    if [ -d "/cygdrive/d" ]; then
        echo "select volume 1" >> /cygdrive/c/remap.sh
        echo "assign letter=Z" >> /cygdrive/c/remap.sh
        diskpart /s C:/remap.sh
        break
    fi
    let "i=i+1"
    if [ "$i" -eq "$DRIVE_RETRY_MAX" ]; then
        df -h
        exit 1
        break
    fi
done

if [ -d "/cygdrive/z" ]; then
    rm -rf /data
    rm -rf /cygdrive/c/data
    mkdir -p /cygdrive/z/data/db
    cmd.exe /c mklink /j C:\\data Z:\\data
    ln -s /cygdrive/z/data /data
    chown -R Administrators /data
else
    exit 1
fi

github_pubkey="${github_public_key}"
github_privkey="${github_private_key}"
github_host="github.com,207.97.227.239 ssh-rsa "
echo "$github_host" | tee -a /home/Administrator/.ssh/known_hosts
echo "$github_privkey" | tee /home/Administrator/.ssh/id_rsa
echo "$github_pubkey" | tee /home/Administrator/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
chmod 600 /home/Administrator/.ssh/*
cp -RT /home/Administrator /home/mci-exec
chown -R mci-exec /home/mci-exec

mkdir -p /data/tmp
chmod 1777 /data/tmp

powershell.exe -Command "Set-ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted"

expansions.value: wmic process list /format:list; wmic os get /format:list

taskkill /IM mongod.exe /IM mongos.exe /IM mongo.exe /IM bsondump.exe /IM mongoimport.exe /IM mongoexport.exe /IM mongodump.exe /IM mongorestore.exe /IM mongostat.exe /IM mongofiles.exe /IM mongooplog.exe /IM mongotop.exe /IM mongobridge.exe /IM mongod-2.6.exe /IM mongos-2.6.exe /IM mongo-2.6.exe /IM bsondump-2.6.exe /IM mongoimport-2.6.exe /IM mongoexport-2.6.exe /IM mongodump-2.6.exe /IM mongorestore-2.6.exe /IM mongostat-2.6.exe /IM mongofiles-2.6.exe /IM mongooplog-2.6.exe /IM mongotop-2.6.exe /IM mongobridge-2.6.exe /IM mongod-2.4.exe /IM mongos-2.4.exe /IM mongo-2.4.exe /IM bsondump-2.4.exe /IM mongoimport-2.4.exe /IM mongoexport-2.4.exe /IM mongodump-2.4.exe /IM mongorestore-2.4.exe /IM mongostat-2.4.exe /IM mongofiles-2.4.exe /IM mongooplog-2.4.exe /IM mongotop-2.4.exe /IM mongobridge-2.4.exe /IM test.exe /IM buildlogger.py /IM smoke.py /IM python.exe /IM cl.exe /IM lock_mgr_test.exe /IM background_job_test.exe /IM repl_coordinator_impl_heartbeat_test.exe /f
